name: Andi
description: Andi is an AI-powered search engine that delivers conversational, ad-free answers instead of traditional link lists.
longDescription: Andi is a next-generation search engine that leverages generative AI to provide direct, conversational answers to user queries, mimicking a chat with a knowledgeable friend. Founded in 2021 by Angela Hoover and Jed White, it aims to address issues like SEO spam, ads, and privacy concerns prevalent in traditional search engines. By combining natural language processing and live data, Andi summarizes information from high-quality sources, ensuring factual accuracy and relevance. Its ad-free, privacy-focused approach prioritizes user experience, offering a clean, visual interface for quick information retrieval. The platform is particularly valuable for students, researchers, and professionals seeking efficient, trustworthy search results without distractions. Andi continues to evolve, with plans for native apps and API integration to enhance accessibility.
features: Generative AI delivers direct answers instead of links, streamlining the search process for users.
Conversational interface mimics chatting with a smart friend, making searches intuitive and engaging.
Ad-free experience eliminates distractions, allowing users to focus on relevant information.
Privacy-focused design ensures no user data is collected or sold, enhancing trust and security.
Visual result presentation simplifies complex information for better understanding and engagement.
Advanced filtering options enable precise search results tailored to user needs.
AI summarization condenses high-quality sources into concise, accurate answers for quick insights.
Semantic search understands query intent, delivering contextually relevant results.
Content generation feature creates fact-based tutorials, reports, or overviews for users.
Progressive Web App support provides a mobile-friendly experience without native app installation.

faqs.question: What makes Andi different from traditional search engines?
faqs.answer: Andi uses generative AI to provide direct, conversational answers instead of link lists, offering a more intuitive and ad-free experience.

faqs.question: Is Andi free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andi is completely free, providing access to its AI-powered search features without subscription fees.

faqs.question: Can Andi handle complex queries?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Andi’s AI is designed to understand and process complex questions, delivering contextually relevant and accurate answers.

faqs.question: Does Andi prioritize user privacy?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andi is privacy-first, ensuring no user data is collected or sold, unlike many traditional search engines.

faqs.question: Is Andi suitable for academic research?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andi’s ability to summarize scholarly content and cite sources makes it ideal for students and researchers.

faqs.question: Can I use Andi on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andi offers a Progressive Web App for mobile users, with native apps in development.

faqs.question: How does Andi ensure result accuracy?
faqs.answer: Andi combines generative AI with live data from high-quality sources, emphasizing factual accuracy and source attribution.

faqs.question: Does Andi offer an API for developers?
faqs.answer: Andi is working on providing an API, though it is not yet available to the public.
